author: kfogel
msg: On the reintegrate branch: Bring up to date with r28475 of trunk.
(svn merge -r28443:28475 https://svn.collab.net/repos/svn/trunk)
Resolve some trivial conflicts due to r28451 and r28452:
* subversion/svn/main.c
(svn_cl__longopt_t): Update in the obvious way.
* subversion/svn/main.c
(svn_cl__options, svn_cl__cmd_table, main): Same.

author: kfogel
msg: Say "descendant" (9,560,000 hits) instead of "descendent" (2,550,000 hits)
everywhere, which fortunately means just in comments right now.
This will matter later, when we integrate the 'reintegrate' branch
(yes, I really said that), because there we add not only a parameter
but a protocol element that includes the word "descendant".

author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r28472, remove some garbage that found it's way into build.conf.
* build.conf (test-scripts): Remove redefinition.

author: pburba
msg: Removed correct-copy-mergeinfo branch.  It was merged to trunk in r28472.

author: pburba
msg: Merge the correct-copy-mergeinfo branch (r28402:28462) to trunk.
Now only WC->WC copies/moves create empty mergeinfo on the copy
destination if no explicit mergeinfo existed on the source.  The three other
copy varieties (WC->URL, URL->WC, URL->URL) *can* result in empty mergeinfo
on the destination, but only if it the source explicitly had it to start
with.
